textBox.richText: Max got sick on friday, so he didn’t want to come up this weekend. Alli was good with me going solo...I was tracking a storm supposed to come in on Saturday night. Spent saturday in spring conditions; met up with Matthias and did some more slushy bumps. Sunday didn’t disappoint...woke up to 10”!!! Hit MJ early, got in line at 8:20, and snagged 10th chair going up.
